name: 2D TopDown RPG Protype
description:
Welcome to my 2D TopDown RPG Prototype 1st build.

Features:

  • PlayerMovement
  • Collision
  • Text System
  • Change Level to load new areas

Future Features:

  • Healing Fountain
  • Combat with swords
  • Store to buy things (Weapons etc)
  • Experience and Level System
  • + More

To Start level again you have to refresh the page

Graphics from https://0x72.itch.io/
